column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our waiter was helpful in suggesting how many dishes to order and how much sangria. We got three bottles of sangria and I was a HUGE fan of the blood orange and blackberry - all about the fruit ones! As for the food
column2: we all ordered a couple of dishes and we're just blown away by how tasty everything was. Garlic shrimp
column4: scallops and spicy potatoes were my top favorites.
